venue.name: University of New England Blewett Hall 006

item.description:
Join us for another session of $1 Permaculture Movie Night.  This time we'll be watching the extremely educational Urban Permaculture film from the Permaculture Research Institute of Australia.  

This film is good for anyone - city, suburbs or rural - who wants to make the best use of small spaces or the space closest to their doorsteps with permaculture techniques.

"Turn the lawns into lunch.  Turn the city into food."

Click here to see a trailer.

6:30 Potluck Supper (bring a dish to share and your own potluck kit!)

7:00 Announcements and Movie

8:30-8:45-ish Discussion and Closing

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We are in Blewett Hall Rm 006; From Stevens Ave, Walk onto campus to the left of the building that looks like a church (Ludcke Hall). You will come into a courtyard and see the Blewett Science Building. Enter at the door to Parker Pavilion.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Permaculture Movie Night: Urban Permaculture
